sentences.english: Ask you how much sorrows can there be?
The gentle wind, blowing open your petty brow tight, so fly back all the worry.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻的风，吹开你紧琐的眉头，让所有的愁向后飞去。

sentences.english: We always have time enough , if we will but use it aright .

sentences.english: However, I have a barn full of animals that supply me with all the food I need.
sentences.chinese: 但我得谷仓里注满了动物，让我吃喝不用愁。

sentences.english: Did not know what it's like to worry about.

sentences.english: Mark is really sitting pretty with his new job.
sentences.chinese: 马克的新工作使他的生活吃喝不愁。

sentences.english: Japan will never be over, the night cool worry more.

sentences.english: I have a bright eyes, see flower see sorrow.

sentences.english: Who Deserted in the ancient shore, wild water clouds everywhere worry.

sentences.english: The five lakes tour, the worry everywhere, Floating and sinking through the ages, and who asked the east?

sentences.english: Tears of worry about passing the year, yellow wine, respect the old neighborhood church.

sentences.english: The last couple of days I've been pulling my hair out.

sentences.english: They made spring are tears, endless, many worry.

sentences.english: Humanity appears upon the scene, hand in hand with trouble.
